classroom

Class FrontWallWithScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • classroom.FrontWall
      • classroom.FrontWallWithScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    visual.statik.SimpleContent
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FrontWallWithScreenAndLights

    public class FrontWallWithScreen
extends FrontWall
    A GUI component that displays the front wall of a classroom with a projector screen (that can be partially lowered).
    Author:
    Ben Kirtley This work complies with the James Madison University honor code
